name: 3D Offroad Car Racing
description:
Game includes all essential components to get maximum enjoy for car driving: almost all possible environment for offload driving including sand, snow, grass, rock, ice.
Fasten your seatbelt get off the road, it gonna be tough rideThis exciting and dynamic game is sure to bring you hours of fun.
There are different location
Car driving realistic.
It very simple to race mode.
You get relistic acceleration.
Great graphics.
Plenty of camera setting.
Game includes all essential components to get maximum enjoy for car driving: almost all possible environment for offload driving including sand, snow, grass, rock, ice.
Fasten your seatbelt get off the road, it gonna be tough ride.
